summary: Craig Stueber has built and contributed to a wide range of production systems across AI safety tooling, enterprise platforms, mobile applications, high-traffic public sites, and experimental systems. His projects consistently emphasize predictability, safety, accessibility, and clear system behavior.

projects.name: Chat Assistant (Personal Site)
projects.description: A safety-focused conversational assistant designed for Craig’s personal website to demonstrate structured intent handling and controlled model behavior.
projects.impact: Demonstrates responsible AI-assisted UX emphasizing trust, guardrails, and deterministic behavior.
highlights: Intent routing into deterministic workflows before model invocation
Guardrails and fallback responses to prevent unsafe behavior
Structured memory using context windows and state machines

projects.name: Dekaflow 2
projects.description: Next-generation internal energy management platform with a focus on reliability, accessibility, and predictable workflows.
projects.impact: Improved system consistency and helped shape AI-assisted development standards for a mission-critical enterprise product.
highlights: Early Copilot prompting guidelines to reduce ambiguity
Cross-functional collaboration with design and QA
Documented debugging and code-review reasoning workflows

projects.name: PurrQuest
projects.description: Location-aware mobile app for tracking outdoor and stray cats with an emphasis on clean state management and geolocation reliability.
projects.impact: Showcases geospatial data modeling and deterministic UI behavior across devices.
highlights: Google Maps API integration with separation of concerns
Secure photo uploads using Supabase policies

projects.name: DanceCard
projects.description: Mobile-first social application connecting people through shared hobbies with safety-focused interaction patterns.
projects.impact: Delivered a full iOS/Android app with real-time chat, events, and moderation-ready data structures.

projects.name: Duke’s Country
projects.description: React-based site supporting national traffic surges during major sporting events.
projects.impact: Handled massive traffic loads while empowering non-technical teams through safe editing workflows.
highlights: Internal LLM helpers for content drafting

projects.name: Hot Tomato Summer
projects.description: Multi-city restaurant voting platform engineered for scale and voting integrity.
projects.impact: Supported tens of thousands of voters while mitigating adversarial behavior.

projects.name: Talos IoT
projects.description: HVAC diagnostics and analytics system with interpretable dashboards for technicians.
projects.impact: Improved predictive maintenance through clear and reliable system health indicators.

projects.name: Blue Door Art Gallery
projects.description: Performance-focused art portfolio site with predictable gallery behavior.
projects.impact: Delivered fast, reliable image presentation with simple admin workflows.

authorNotes: Project summaries reflect Craig Stueber’s direct contributions and architectural responsibilities. Details are derived from firsthand project documentation.
